<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>
            create a form
        </title>
    </head>
    <style>
        h1 {
            text-align: center;
            color: crimson;
        }
        h3{
            background-color: blueviolet;
            color: honeydew;
        }
        body{
            background-color: black;
            color: dimgrey;
        }
    </style>
    <body>
        <h1>BOOKING MOVIE TICKETS</h1>
        <h3><marquee>watch your favourite movie</marquee></h3>
        <img src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAASwAAACoCAMAAABt9SM9AAABLFBMVEX29vYiHh/39/fgHib6+vr0w8b79/b8s7atFx8AAAAeGhv19/b09PQcGBl4d3dSUFEWEBK7vMB0cnNGREXh4eGTkZItKyoPCQutq6w5Njj///
        
        IwZKQgiUhBUtCCpaEFCwJKVgSUrAkpGBJSMGSkIIlIQVLQgqWhBQsCSlYElKwJKRgSUjBkpCCJSEFS0IKloQULAkpWBJSsCSkYElIwZIQkvvtaP/k+n949QgnzHEKrgAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==" height="200" width="1000">

        <form>
            <fieldset>

                <legend>person details</legend>
            <label for="name">NAME</label>
            <input type="text" name="NAME"><br><br>
            <label for="phno">PHNO</label>
            <input type="text" name="PHNO"> <br><br>
            <label for="email">EMAIL</label>
            <input type="text" name="EMAIL"><br><br>
            <select name="gender">
                <option>GENDER</option>
                <option value="male">MALE</option>
                <option value="female">FEMALE</option>
                <option value="others">OTHERS</option><br><br>
            </select>
        </fieldset>
        <fieldset>
            <legend>movie details</legend>
            <select name="SELECT MOVIE">
                <option>SELECT MOVIE</option>
                <option value="GODFATER">GODFATHER</option>
                <option value="ghost">GHOST</option>
                <option value="SWATI MUTYAM">SWATI MUTYAM</option>
            </select><br><br>
            <label for="no of tickets">NO OF TICKETS</label>
            <input type="number" name="NO OF TICKETS"><br><br>
         </fieldset>
         <fieldset>
            <legend>interval snacks</legend>
            <input type="checkbox" name="popcorn">popcorn
            <input type="checkbox" name="samosa">samosa
            <input type="checkbox" name="pizza">pizza
            <input type="checkbox" name="cool drinks">colldrinks
         </fieldset>
         <fieldset>
            <legend>payment method</legend>
                <select name="payment optoin">payment option
                <option>payment option</option>
                <option value="1">cash</option>
                <option value="1">g pay</option>
                <option value="1">phone pay</option>
                <option value="1">credit card</option>

                </select>
         </fieldset>
         <fieldset>
            <legend>other instruction</legend>
            <label for="other instruction"></label>
            <textarea name="" rows="3" cols="40"></textarea>
         </fieldset>
         <input type="submit" value="submit">
         <input type="submit" value="cancle">

        </form>

    </body>
</html>
